TimeAttackGenComp.output_name: STRING: name for summary output files
TimeAttackGenComp.output_dir: FOLDER: folder in which to copy output files
TimeAttackGenComp.target_bed: FILE: full path to BED: eg. 1000_gen/1000g_0.15MAF.refGene.uniq.bed
TimeAttackGenComp.ref: STRING: full path to snap index folder
TimeAttackGenComp.ref_fasta: FILE: full path to genome reference multi-fasta
TimeAttackGenComp.compare: STRING: full path to local compare_simple.pl
TimeAttackGenComp.R_heatmap: STRING: full path to local heatmap.R
TimeAttackGenComp.plot_dist: STRING: full path to local plot_dist.R
